org.apache.river.test.impl.outrigger.matching

Class MatchTestBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.river.qa.harness.QATestEnvironment
      • org.apache.river.test.share.TestBase
        • org.apache.river.test.impl.outrigger.matching.MatchTestCore
          • org.apache.river.test.impl.outrigger.matching.MatchTestBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Test, TestEnvironment
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdminIteratorTest, BlockingTest, FieldMatchTest, FieldNotifyTest, SingletonMatchTestBase, SupertypeMatchTest, SupertypeNotifyTest, TakeOneTest

    public abstract class MatchTestBase
extends MatchTestCore
    Base class for matching tests. Sets up an audited JavaSpace and provides a number of convince methods.

      • writeBunch

        protected void writeBunch(net.jini.core.entry.Entry filter)
                   throws Exception
        Write a bunch of test entries to the JavaSpace that are instances of the class of the passed entry. null is considered to have the class Entery. Not valid until construct() is called.
        Throws:
        Exception
        See Also:
        construct(org.apache.river.qa.harness.QAConfig)
